name: SWIO RAFI Comoros Non-Tropical Cyclone Losses
description: SWIO RAFI Comoros Non-Tropical Cyclone Losses.  Administrative level 2 AAL map and Return Period curves for 10 - 1000 year return periods.

contribution.purpose: National and administrative level risk assessment

loss_maps._cf_loss_map_value_data_query: gid AS asset_ref, geom AS the_geom, aal AS loss FROM temp.swio_com_ntc_loss_aal_adm_2

loss_curve_maps._cf_loss_curve_map_value_data_query: gid AS asset_ref, geom AS the_geom, ARRAY[rp10,rp25,rp50,rp100,rp250,rp500,rp1000] AS losses, ARRAY[10,25,50,100,250,500,1000] AS rates FROM temp.swio_com_ntc_loss_aal_adm_2
